bioRad 0.3.0

Read a time series of vertical profiles (vpts) from file

Source: R/read_vpts.R
read_vpts.Rd

Read a time series of vertical profiles (vpts) from file

read_vpts(file, radar, wavelength = "C")

Arguments

file

A text file containing the standard output (stdout) generated by vol2bird (or the package function calculate_vp).
radar

A string containing a radar identifier.
wavelength

Radar wavelength in cm, or one of 'C' or 'S' for C-band and S-band radar, respectively.

Value

An object inhereting from class vpts, see vpts for details.

Examples

# locate example file:
vptsfile <- system.file("extdata", "vpts.txt", package = "bioRad")
# load time series:
ts <- read_vpts(vptsfile, radar = "KBGM", wavelength = "S")
ts
#>                    Irregular time series of vertical profiles (class vpts)
#> 
#>            radar:  KBGM 
#>       # profiles:  6135 
#> time range (UTC):  2016-09-01 00:02:00 - 2016-09-30 23:58:00 
#>    time step (s):  min: 180     max:  16320
